Articles.Content:
Me and one of my friends are learning to develop KSP mods and we have made a plan to create an autoland mod.

We haven't started developing the mod be I have made this just to tell you and please comment if you have any mod creation advice.

We hope to have the first part of this mod done by the end of 2018. We are learning so if this takes longer then expected, were sorry.

Hi, I want to state that there is already an awesome autopilot-ish like mod out there it's called MechJeb. You might just want to work with @sarbian for improvements etc.

Alternately, good luck and much success!

Edited May 9, 2018 by LatiMacciato
